skillTree.name: Barded Ithilmar Steed
skillTree.description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

skillTree.name: Ithilmar Chariot
skillTree.description: Excellent Elven chariots, barded with priceless Ithilmar for extra protection on the battlefield but at no cost in speed or agility.

skillTree.name: Lileath's Blessing
skillTree.description: Those facing a great challenge, a difficult decision, or simply in need of luck, may call upon the Goddess of Dreams and Fortune.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +8% when increasing

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Searing Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Searing Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Searing Doom Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Glittering Robe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Transmutation of Lead"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Transmutation of Lead Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Transmutation of Lead Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Final Transmutation"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Meddler
backgroundSkills.description: This one can never leave something alone. They always have to meddle.

effects.description:
Construction cost: +10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Builder
backgroundSkills.description: Much of the Ulthuan skyline built over the last thousand years is down to this oneâ€™s sterling endeavours.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Administrator
backgroundSkills.description: If it requires accuracy and organisation, this one is your Elf. Not so much fun at parties, however.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Incompetent
backgroundSkills.description: There's usually a right way and a wrong way to do anything. This one generally gets it wrong.

backgroundSkills.name: Dealer
backgroundSkills.description: "Too late, too late!" will be the cry, when the one with the bargains passes you by.

backgroundSkills.name: Entrepreneur
backgroundSkills.description: "There's always a way - always an angle. You just have to find it."

backgroundSkills.name: Luddite
backgroundSkills.description: Machinery - and indeed progress of any kind - is anathema to this one, because there's no substitute for good, honest toil.

backgroundSkills.name: Thinker
backgroundSkills.description: Fortunately, there are some who really apply themselves to the problems of the world. Just as well, otherwise we'd beâ€¦ Oh wait...

backgroundSkills.name: Genius
backgroundSkills.description: An individual of exceptional skill and worth; the very embodiment of sagacity.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -25%
	(enemy characters in region)

backgroundSkills.name: Uniped
backgroundSkills.description: They say two are better than one. They are, of course, totally wrong in every respect.

backgroundSkills.name: Spry
backgroundSkills.description: Impressively energetic for a thousand years old - even by their own reckoning.

backgroundSkills.name: Limber
backgroundSkills.description: "Staying this supple takes effort. You donâ€™t get definition like that by sitting about and drinking."

backgroundSkills.name: Peaky
backgroundSkills.description: Looking "not too well" has become a permanent condition. Clearly, they're lacking essential herbs.

backgroundSkills.name: Fortuitous
backgroundSkills.description: Chance is like magic - it can be harnessed to the individual's will.

backgroundSkills.name: Protected
backgroundSkills.description: "If you need anything, there are guards outside the doors. Many guards."

backgroundSkills.name: Enervated
backgroundSkills.description: If ever there was a candidate for a relaxing break at an all-inclusive spa, it was this one.

backgroundSkills.name: Primed
backgroundSkills.description: Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action - wherever, whenever.

backgroundSkills.name: Conductor
backgroundSkills.description: Through their veins a charge is racing. Energy, filling the ominous void within.

backgroundSkills.name: Inhibited
backgroundSkills.description: This one doesn't even relax in their own company, so reserved is their nature.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: 10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Dampener
backgroundSkills.description: Definitely not the life and soul of the party; they exude melancholy and depression.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Negator
backgroundSkills.description: Not every cloud has a silver lining.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

backgroundSkills.name: Flustered
backgroundSkills.description: Cool, calm, and collected. Yeah, right!

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Resistant
backgroundSkills.description: Action, inaction, change - you name it, this one will work against the prevailing wind.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 5% for infantry units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Protective
backgroundSkills.description: Whatever quality is needed to stand guard over the Asur way of life, this one has it in abundance.

backgroundSkills.name: Ridiculed
backgroundSkills.description: Fortitude? Strength of character? Do me a favour - this yellow-bellied poltroon has none.

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: +1 turn for Phoenix units (minimum 1)
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Flammable
backgroundSkills.description: Tempers, like wicks, can be ignited. Watch the anger burn.

effects.description:
Ward save: 5% for Phoenix units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Incendiary
backgroundSkills.description: You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire - it's explosive to say the least!
